content: *knit free this is a thank you * knitting is my love language and i get to knit to earn my living and support my family thanks to your continued support every now and then i like to publish patterns that are free for everyone to enjoy as a way to permanently thank the knitting community for this opportunity thank you from the bottom of my heart for allowing me to live a full and happy life *knit free* is also an invitation to use your imagination and free yourself from the burden of spending much when knitting as knitters our biggest resource is our wit and our craft and what will make your project wonderful are your hands not how much you spend ❤️ let s knit free **finished measurements** 31 inches 78 cm circumference and 13¼ inches 33 cm long **materials** *main yarn * 1 skein of rastita by malabrigo 100% merino 100g/310 yards or 310 yards 285 m of light dk or heavy sport weight yarn shown in the colorway plomo *contrasting colors * leftovers of fingering weight yarn in 6 different colors adding a total of approx 310 yards 285 m i used different brands and textures and picked colors that formed an fade ombre or gradient progression you will need approx 15g 52 yards 47 m of each color you could also use any 6-mini-skein set or mini-skeins that different dyers offer you can pick any color combination and you don t need to make an ombre progression you can arrange them as you prefer in my sample i used the lightest color first and the darkest last *needles * us 5 3 75 mm and us 8 5mm circular needles 24 60 cm long other notions stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge** 18 5 stitches and 27 row to 4 10 cm in lace pattern on us 8 5 mm needles after blocking
